name: pathfinding-fx.js
description: A visualization library experiment for interactive website effects based on pathfinding algorithms

scripts.build:dev: babel src/pathfinding-fx.js -d dist --copy-files && babel src/pathfinding-fx.js -d docs --copy-files
scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run build:min

author: Marco Schlichting (MarcoPlain)
